title: Peer Into

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Peer into up to two players, and choose if you will also peer into their visitors.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may only unlock the next level of investigation by having investigated every alive player with the previous level
> Level 1 - Nothing. If you have peered into this player before, learn a suspicious/not suspicious result
> Level 2 - Investigator (35)
> Level 3 - Exact role
> Level 4 - Exact role, bypassing all detection immunity, automatically attack evil roles
- If you peer into multiple players on a night, you won't know whose result belongs to who.
